name: Busy Body
description:
Eleanor won’t leave the house before having collected all the necessary items to create THE appropriate Halloween costume. Halloween is the day she gets to leave the house freely. She looks forward to finding and meeting her new-found great great grandson at a party later at night.

Game Developed by Guimero (https://guimero64.tumblr.com/) and Yosoykini for the Ludum-Dare-45.
